reviewText: I think the show would of been better if it didn't have Josh Gad.  He just didn't fit well with Billy Crystal.  Pick this up if you are a Billy Crystal fan though.
The show was hilarious. The chemistry between the two was terrific. Some of the skits were just so great - Billy smiling at the camera in the back of the limo had me cracking up.
I disagree with the other reviewer. It was a very funny show. Too bad it wasn't picked up for another season. Damage Control was a particularly funny episode.
Did not meet my expectations,I'made sorry but it sucked
